title: The Medical Book - From Witch Doctors to Robot Surgeons (gnv64)
description:
The Medical Book: From Witch Doctors to Robot Surgeons, 250 Milestones in the History of Medicine
by Clifford A. Pickover
Sterling | September 2012 | ISBN-10: 1402785852 | ePUB | 18.2 mb

Following his hugely successful The Math Book and The Physics Book, Clifford Pickover now chronicles the advancement of medicine in 250 entertaining, illustrated landmark events. Touching on such diverse subspecialties as genetics, pharmacology, neurology, sexology, and immunology, Pickover intersperses â€œobviousâ€ historical milestones--the Hippocratic Oath, general anesthesia, the Human Genome Project--with unexpected and intriguing topics like â€œtruth serum,â€ the use of cocaine in eye surgery, and face transplants.

About the Author 
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/ff/Pickover.jpg
Clifford A. Pickover received his Ph.D. from Yale University and is the author of over 30 books on such topics as computers and creativity, art, mathematics, black holes, religion, human behavior and intelligence, time travel, alien life, and science fiction.
Pickover is a prolific inventor with dozens of patents, is the associate editor for several journals, the author of colorful puzzle calendars, and puzzle contributor to magazines geared to children and adults.
